Di tahun 2007, Perseroan menjadi perusahaan public dengan nama PT Darma Henwa Tbk dengan mencatatkan 3.150.000.000 (tiga miliar seratus lima puluh juta) saham biasa di Bursa Efek Indonesia dengan kode saham DEWA.

artikel:
Jakarta adalah ibu kota Indonesia dengan penduduk sebanyak 10 juta jiwa. Diperkirakan bahwa lebih dari empat juta penduduk di daerah sekitar Jabodetabek menempuh perjalanan ke dan dari kota setiap hari kerja. Masalah transportasi semakin mulai menarik perhatian politik dan telah diprediksikan bahwa tanpa terobosan transportasi utama, kemacetan akan membanjiri kota dan akan menjadi kemacetan lalu lintas yang sangat parah sehingga kendaraan tidak bisa bergerak bahkan pada saat baru keluar dari garasi rumah pada tahun 2020.

Sejak tahun 1980 lebih dari dua puluh lima studi subjek umum dan khusus telah dilakukan terkait dengan kemungkinan sistem Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) di Jakarta. Salah satu alasan utama yang menunda penanggulangan masalah ini adalah krisis ekonomi dan politik 1997-1999. Sebelum krisis, sebuah Build-Operate-Transfer (BOT) yang dianggap sebagai bagian dari MRT baru melibatan sektor swasta. Setelah krisis, rencana mengandalkan BOT untuk menyediakan pembiayaan terbukti tidak layak dan proyek MRT kembali diusulkan sebagai skema yang didanai pemerintah.

Saat ini PT MRT Jakarta kembali membuka lowongan kerja terbaru pada bulan Desember 2020. Adapun dibawah ini adalah posisi jabatan yang saat ini tersedia bagi Anda para pencari kerja yang tertarik untuk mengembangkan karir Anda bersama PT MRT Jakarta dengan kualifikasi sebagai berikut.

  5. Melakukan support dalam koordinasi penanganan perkara terkait dengan sengketa perusahaan baik yang bersifat litigasi maupun non litigasi;

IKEA adalah pengecer perabot rumah tangga terbesar di dunia. Kami membuka toko pertama kami di 2014 di Alam Sutera, Tangerang dan toko kedua di 2019 di Sentul City, Bogor. Rekan kerja kami telah berkembang hingga 194.000 rekan kerja di seluruh dunia. Budaya kita didasarkan pada semangat kebersamaan, antusiasme, dan kesenangan. Kami selalu mencari orang-orang yang berbagi sikap dan nilai-nilai positif kami

Kami menawarkan kemungkinan karir dan pembelajaran yang luar biasa di IKEA. Rekan kerja kami didorong untuk mencoba peran yang berbeda, dan banyak perubahan antara fungsi dan negara beberapa kali dalam karier mereka. Anda dapat merancang jalur karier Anda sendiri sesuai dengan rencana pengembangan dan tujuan masa depan Anda.

Saat ini IKEA Indonesia kembali membuka lowongan kerja terbaru pada bulan Desember 2020. Adapun dibawah ini adalah posisi jabatan yang saat ini tersedia bagi Anda para pencari kerja yang tertarik untuk mengembangkan karir Anda bersama IKEA Indonesia dengan kualifikasi sebagai berikut.

Lowongan Kerja IKEA Indonesia

1. Replenishment Range Specialist

Qualification

  1. Experienced in retailing and/or in home furnishing and life at home.
  2. University degree (Logistics, Economics, Business Administration or related) or 1-2 years’ experience in the area of expertise.
  3. Retail/home furnishing/supply chain/customer service experience and interest.
  4. Collaborative mind-set: good in building relationships within the organisation with ability to influence others within the own area of expertise by using communication skills.
  5. Experience in problem solving and improving ways of working.
  6. Attention to quality with ability to complete the work according to procedures and quality standards in timely manner.
  7. High organisational skills and ability to work in a structured way.
  8. End-to-end orientation: ability to apply analytical process oriented thinking when acting and propose solutions.
  9. Proven analytical and numeric skills and ability to identify required actions.
  10. Ability to respond to business and customer needs by providing effective solutions within the area of expertise.
  11. Confident and clear communication on English both written and verbal.
  12. Excellent computer skills and high proficiency on Microsoft Office.
  13. Deadline 31 December 2020
2. Service Fulfilment Operations Manager

Qualification

  1. University degree (Economics, Logistics, Supply Chain Management) or proven performance in logistics/commercial/supply chain management.
  2. 4-6 years working experience in a management position (preferable in distribution, retail, logistics or similar).
  3. Proven successful leadership in a big organisation, delivering both business result and people development.
  4. Retail/home furnishing/supply chain/customer service experience and interest.
  5. Experience of working as a management team member with proven ability to make a difference by positively influencing the business directly as well as through good collaboration.
  6. Knowledge of labour laws and third-party relations (unions, external service providers etc.)
  7. Experience in securing the implementation of mid-term and long-term strategies and plans and set/follow up goals.
  8. Proven ability to influence in a matrix organisation.
  9. Successfully lead projects or processes on country/market/national level.
  10. Good coaching and/or mentor, advisory and facilitation skills, conflict management skills and problem-solving experience.
  11. Fluent in English written and verbal.
  12. Deadline 31 December 2020
3. Contry Graphic Designer Leader

Qualification

  1. Education and experience gained in graphic communication design, media and typography.
  2. Proven success in managing, inspiring, leading and developing people and creative processes within IKEA organisations.
  3. Experienced in visually expressing the IKEA identity.
  4. Creative and commercial visual competence, including a keen eye for aesthetics.
  5. Proven customer-focused mindset.
  6. Clear communication and coaching skills, i.e. the ability to explain concepts verbally and visual interpretation.
  7. Set and implement action plans over a number of years, set expectations, provide clear direction and follow up goals.
  8. Proven ability to prioritise and organise work and the work of others in order to make the most efficient use of time available and meet agreed goals and deadlines.
  9. Communicate confidently and clearly in English.
  10. Experienced in problem solving.
  11. Computer proficient with knowledge and experience of using graphic design software (Adobe Creative Suite) and production tools.
  12. Deadline 31 December 2020

Qualification

  1. You have broad knowledge of best practices for creating, publishing and editing content from a customer point of view as well as of how to structure and present information in all touchpoints.
  2. Proven ability of defining, planning, creating, executing and following up on range presentation documentation in a relevant, simple and inspiring way with IKEA tone of voice and visual identity as well as of trends that influence home furnishing, retail design and communication to gain insight to a more appealing product presentation for customers as well as of graphic design.
  3. You have broad knowledge of IKEA concept, brand objectives, values and vision, IKEA tools, processes and cycles.
  4. Have broad knowledge of the IKEA multichannel reality and online customer behavior.
  5. Deep knowledge of customer behavior and life at home.
  6. Capability to translate abstract concepts into graphic representations as well as ability to create innovative retail and home furnishing designs based on concept and marketing objective.
  7. Proven experience of independent work with proven successes of the solution implemented.
  8. Proven capability of working cross-functional collaboration.
  9. Knowledge of trends that influence home furnishing, retail design and communication.
  10. Creative and commercial visual competence with a keen eye for aesthetics.
  11. Demonstrate clear communication skills, i.e. the ability to explain verbally concepts and visual interpretation.
  12. Computer proficient with the knowledge and experience of using relevant software.
  13. Communicate confidently and clearly in English.
  14. Deadline 31 December 2020
